system.effect: Normal Forme Kyurem can merge with a willing Zekrom as an Extended Action to turn into Black Fusion Forme, or with a willing Reshiram to turn into White Fusion Forme. The respective Zekrom or Reshiram are absorbed and disappear while Fused. The user may unmerge as an Extended Action, and its partner then reappears. All XP earned while Fused is split evenly between Kyurem and its partner. This Pok√©mon has a different set of Moves for each Forme.
